body_html: I bet the function was renamed a long time ago, but the docstring wasn't updated. Everybody owns this. A PR to fix the docstring would be very welcome. I think this virtual function name should just be corrected to natural_exp_decay. I am also not sure that the earlier "decay exponentially with a base of 0.96" is useful (or correct).

body: I bet the function was renamed a long time ago, but the docstring wasn't updated. Everybody owns this. A PR to fix the docstring would be very welcome.
